name: Skelemancer
description:
Mr Crow's got a job for you. Kill all those goblins. You think you can make it through all 10 levels? Hah. Hahahaha. Hahahahahaha. Hahahahahahahahah. Really though it's not that hard so I think you can make it through all 10 levels in a short session. Or can you? I guess there's only one way to find out...

Controls:

WASD / Arrows - Move

Spacebar - Raise them skeletons

R - Restart the level

ESC - Menu
